edu.rit.pj2.tracker

Interface ReceiverListener


  • public interface ReceiverListener
    Interface ReceiverListener specifies the interface for an object that listens for notifications from a Receiver.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void receiverFailed(Receiver receiver, Throwable exc)
      Report that the given receiver failed.

    • Method Detail

      • receiverFailed

        void receiverFailed(Receiver receiver,
                  Throwable exc)
        Report that the given receiver failed.
        Parameters:
        receiver - Receiver.
        exc - Exception that was thrown.
